title: Silence from city schools on "ghost students" and other issues
body: BALTIMORE (WBFF) - Another week has gone by without answers from Baltimore City schools and city leaders on multiple issues involving the city's children.FOX45 News' Project Baltimore again broke news this week.They introduced us to a former city schools student who says he stopped attending school in 2017.Yet, the school system apparently kept receiving your tax dollars to educate him for two more years.It's just the latest in what is becoming a major school scandal.FOX45's Mikenzie Frost is demanding answers from city leaders about the system that keeps letting students fail.
